text: Gary Lee Thomas (born 1962) is a United States Marine Corps four-star general.https://www.dvidshub.net/image/4792165/lieutenant-general-gary-l- thomas-promotion-ceremony He is the current Assistant Commandant of the Marine Corps. ==Awards and decorations== Thomas' decorations and medals include: {| |colspan="16" style="text-align:center;"|200px |- |colspan="16" style="text-
